sentences.en: ...the hissing of a tape rewinding on its spool.
sentences.cn: …磁带在卷轴上倒转时的嘶嘶声。

sentences.en: A penny for a spool of thread, A penny for a needle.
sentences.cn: 一便士买了线轴, 一便士买了针.

sentences.en: A ratchet mechanism transfers the thread from spool to bobbin.
sentences.cn: 一种棘齿装置把线从线轴转到梭心上。

sentences.en: Are you sure you want to change the spool folder?
sentences.cn: 确实要改变假脱机文件夹 吗 ?

sentences.en: Below the spool length is the ordering code for that spool.
sentences.cn: 下列短管长度是短管的订购编号.

sentences.en: Can you wind this film back on to its spool?
sentences.cn: 你能把这胶卷卷回到卷轴上去 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can you wind this film back on to spool?
sentences.cn: 你能把这胶卷“卷”回到卷轴上去 吗 ?

sentences.en: On dictation equipment, a spool on which magnetic tape is wound.
sentences.cn: 在口述记录设备上, 一种卷绕磁带的轴.

sentences.en: T low plate series hydraulic pressure five - spool thread heavy cargo transport vehicle.
sentences.cn: 高手请翻译“150T凹型五轴线液压凹板车”(英语)

sentences.en: The effect of spool coupling on compressor stability was analyzed.
sentences.cn: 研究了转子耦合对高、低压转子稳定性的影响.

sentences.en: The film flew off the spool and wound itself round the projector.
sentences.cn: 电影胶片从卷轴滑出缠绕在放映机上了.

sentences.en: The use of steering wheel - driven power steering means sliding spool.
sentences.cn: 动力转向采用方向盘驱动滑阀芯方式.

sentences.en: Thomas squatted on the forward deck, whistling tunelessly , polishing the broze spool of the anchor winch.
sentences.cn: 托马斯蹲在前甲板上擦起锚绞车的黄铜轴, 边擦边胡乱吹着口哨.

sentences.en: Those spool - winding and stitching machines interest me a lot.
sentences.cn: 那些绕线机和缝缀机器我最感兴趣.

sentences.en: Unable to write driver associated files in spool directory.
sentences.cn: 无法在伫列目录中写入驱动程式相关档案.

trans.tran_cn: 线轴, 所绕的数量, 缠线用的框
trans.tran_en: an object shaped like a wheel that you wind thread, wire etc around
